overview:
At 18 years old, Nitin is a very busy young man. In the past, Nitin served as the Head of Internships and Volunteers for Mayor Wilsonâ€™s State Assembly Campaign, Chair of Community Outreach for the City of San Ramon TC, ASB Vice President-Treasurer & Speaker at California High School, Founder of SizzleStream.com and Inova Productions and has spent his summers interning around Silicon Valley, most recently at the Haas School of Business in Berkeley. Nitinâ€™s outlook on life changed when he moved to Seoul, South Korea in 5th grade. Nitin has presented his business ideas in front of many Silicon Valley executives and continues to follow his passion for innovation.

Nitin is known to be a thought leader with an aspiration for innovation. He strives to build creative technology, develop revolutionizing services and being an active member of his community and school. Nitin has held positions as President, EVP, Chair and other various officer positions in 10+ organizations that are related to business, community, government, education and technology. At the young age of 18 he has made a positive impact within many organizations and within his community.

Nitin has many strengths and abilities but he is not afraid to admit that he makes mistakes and believes that he can always learn off others.
